website_summaries.verdict: A good every day stroller that is easy to use, sturdy and lightweight.
pros: Front wheels can lock or swivel
Can be used with a 3- or 5-point harness system
Includes a tray for both parent and child
cons: This model can have some problems with squeaky wheels

customer_reviews.title: Better than a $300 Stroller
customer_reviews.text: OMG love the stroller. We got a 3 wheel one at our baby shower that my wife picked out. We could barely fit it in the trunk, and it did not have shocks. This thing was a fraction of the price, and so much better. Folds and fits in the trunk super easy. Has cup holders and good storage space. The quick connect works great with the car seat. The wheels are FOAM RUBBER, not plastic, like some people said. Love the shocks. Just all around great!. Our other one cost $300 and came with a car seat. This one does not come with a car seat, but you can pick up the same car seat on here for $60
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Souza

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I am a mom of 7. I've been through a few strollers over the years. This stroller folds easily and I can do it while holding the baby. It has a strap to lift it up into the trunk and I can also do that with 1 hand. The infant seat clicks easily into the stroller. Over all I love it. I do wish the space between the cup holders was a little deeper. I've had a few items bounce out and my phone barely fits. I have a small phone with no case, so it does fit. You can push the stroller and steer it with one hand- easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: rides smoothly but small basket
customer_reviews.text: it looks nice and it rides really smoothly so i only need one hand to manoeuvre it. That was wat I really wanted in a stroller. However, the basket bellow is too small, doesnt carry much. I like that it is easy too fold but my fingers get caught a lot. Also I could be doing it wrong but when you fold it it doesnt lock into place. So when unfolding it just bursts open in a clumsy way.
customer_reviews.author: PTB

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I spent so much time researching strollers that I could afford and were good quality. I was nervous when ordering it that since it was one of the more affordable strollers that it wouldn’t be durable. I was pleasantly surprised though. It’s made with quality materials, easy to navigate, easy to assemble and easy to fold up. It’s a little bulky, but probably all durable strollers will be. It’s simple to click in the Graco infant seat into. I’m expecting it’ll be a reliable stroller for my little one to use as she grows. Just wish it came in a girly color.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cannady

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love the stroller! We bought a cheaper on Amazon that broke rather quickly and so decided to go with a brand-name item. I like that it will also take the baby's carseat, since we bought the carseat without the stroller. Looks well-made, had to read the instructions to see how everything worked (reclining the seat, etc.). Love the padding at the top and sides of the back of the seat!! Very nice for a sleepy baby's head. Should have bought this one first.
customer_reviews.author: ChattyOneTop Contributor: Quilting

customer_reviews.title: Only stroller we need. Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect stroller. The perfect balance between a lightweight umbrella stroller and a deluxe full sized one. Its light. I can fold, lift and unfold with one hand. It can stand alone while folded. Small enough that I can leave it in the back of my vehicle all the time without it being in the way. I like that it has cup holders for me and baby. Seat reclines. Plenty of storage beneath. We have taken this stroller everywhere and it continues to be a joy.
customer_reviews.author: Devan Wallen

customer_reviews.title: Only the Best for Grandbaby!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect in every way. It has an adjustable back so the child can be in a upright, reclining, or sleeping position. The wheels are very nice and maneuver easily making taking walks with my grandbaby a delight. The canopy has a nice mesh screen so I can see what is going on in the stroller as I am walking. Easy to get baby in and out of and very light weight for lifting into the back of my compact SUV. I recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Nickel

customer_reviews.title: Important part missing
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product .right side wheel snap is missing, it's very important to ride . As I have returned a product last week,I am tired of returning product, decided to keep this product Totally waste of money .also holding strap looks like tearning.
customer_reviews.author: Muthukumaran Devadass

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought it to keep at my parent's house so we don't have to use space in the car when we make the trip out. Last week I took a flight from my parent's house to Hawaii and brought this stroller with me. It did great navigating the airport, sandy beaches, tropical terrain, and lava rock. I'm currently debating buying a second to keep at my house.
customer_reviews.author: MAshlyn

customer_reviews.title: Need five point harness for smaller babies
customer_reviews.text: For small babies, please dont buy this stroller. It doesn't have an arm lock like in other five point harness, as my lil one slides down while unclicking. So i always make sure to stand in front and block her before i try to remove her from the stroller
customer_reviews.author: MuSe

customer_reviews.title: it pushed nicely but ill mostly likely be returning it
customer_reviews.text: i guess you get what you pay for? i had high hopes. its mostly plastic, no rubber wheels, sun shade doesn't cover much of baby at all. it pushed nicely but ill mostly likely be returning it. just not what i expected. pros. light weight, feels comfortable, comes with both parents and kids tray, easy to put together, pushed nicely, big basket, cons: plastic, what sun shade? , no rubber wheels,
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, works with click connect car seat snugride35
customer_reviews.text: This stroller was so easy to assemble, folds easily, glides smoothly and is compatible with the graco snugride35carseat. I've heard so mapping parents over the years, mine included gripe and stress over strollers and what a pain they are but this stroller is a dream. It also has cup holders for you and baby along with decent storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’m glad I bought this stroller. It caught my eye on amazon for a good price. I’ve used it a decent amount since I’ve bought it and it’s perfect for my daughter! It’ll be great for her to grow into also. Putting it together wasn’t too bad and I am awful at putting things together. I’m really happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller
customer_reviews.text: I do like this stroller. It is light, maneuvers well and I can use my car seat until my son gets older. We have taken it out a few times now and it gets the job done. The only complaint I have is the clip that holds it together while folded doesn’t work very well. But I don’t have to fold it that often so not a big deal!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle b

customer_reviews.title: works with car seat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter for her first child. She chose this particular unit so being a great grandma I purchased the one she wanted. I will assume she did her homework because this works with the car seat she also has so just made sense. I'm sure this will work just great for her.
customer_reviews.author: char

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it four stars because I hate that the backrest doesn't sit up enough. My little one (9 Months) struggles to sit up and makes it uncomfortable after a while of riding. Other than that it's very manurverable and lightweight. I like how it folds in half for travel. I wish lt had a bigger storage compartment underneath. I have a Graco Click Connect carseat and it clicks into the stroller as well which is really handy.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Dinkins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lightweight stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect lightweight stroller. I had graco jogger before and it was so heavy and bulky I could barely lift it. This stroller is so light I can pick it up and unfold it all while holding a baby!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Foster

customer_reviews.title: not the greatest stroller in terms of maneuverability but perfect if you ...
customer_reviews.text: not the greatest stroller in terms of maneuverability but perfect if you just need something for occasional walks and don't want to spend a fortune. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. A.

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Grace Click Connect car seat separately. For the price, this stroller is great! I t makes sharp turns pretty smoothly. Altogether it is a great stroller. Very lightweight, plenty of storage and cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Folds easily, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to maneuver and fold. Very lightweight. The handle connection next to the folding button wiggles, like it's not a solid connection. Hopefully this won't get worse and break. Not sure if that's normal or not.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: i don't like that it doesn't have an easy lift up front ...
customer_reviews.text: i don't like that it doesn't have an easy lift up front to put baby into. i don't like that the leg rest doesn't lift up the hood is way to short I am very glad that I bought the extra shade hood separate. I bought this in March and here it is July and for no reason the fabric is tearing away at the top from where the cup holder post is. Id like to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth woodcock

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: I had the Graco jogger, which I love, but it was so big forsome outings. We were headed to Disney for the day and I wanted something a little smaller. This stroller is perfect and I’m so glad I switched. It’s lightweight and folds perfectly in my car. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Meg D

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stroller
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stroller! And I love how the carseat can click right into it. I traveled with this stroller and even went to Disney Land with it and it made my life a lot easier!
customer_reviews.author: MrsGladden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect stroller for what we were looking for!! Small enough that it works well for travel but big enough that your not compromising comfort for your baby and room for diaper bags ect.. purchased to be used for travel, worked well through TSA and now keep in the back of my trunk for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: kcclone

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had it for about two weeks I don’t even use it every day for my 6 month old and it’s squeaking like crazy we assembled everything correctly and tried to figure out why it’s squeaking but can’t .I can’t use it because of that it hurts my little ones ears wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller! We were gifted a jogger for our baby shower. I quickly realized it was too big for shopping and trying to maneuver the tight aisles and racks in the stores. We bought this stroller and immediately fell in love. It’s great for indoor use and maneuvering indoors. Wouldn’t recommend for frequent uses outdoors as the wheels are not rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT Classic Connect Graco car seat compatible
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT compatible with Classic Connect Graco car seats. Period. (Much to my consternation.) It would be more feasable to purchase a Non-Graco stroller & get an adapter for Classic Connect car seat. Or buy an entire stroller/car seat set of Click Connect Graco. Overall it is a lovely stroller. Nice side cushioning. Easy quick assembly. Simple easy to follow directions. Solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy for the $$
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to fold and open. The latch on the tray is tight and hard to release, but I expect it will loosen up with use. It rides smoothly, turns easily and the wheels lock easily. It is very roomy without being bulky. I wish it could stand on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia T.

customer_reviews.title: Was fine but now not good
customer_reviews.text: The product was good and reliable but then it went downhill recently as it seems to go right and left which becomes a difficulty while walking. This should be fixed
customer_reviews.author: Rooman Ashraf

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because reviews said that it was lightweight and durable, so far, I love it. Super easy to assemble and yes, it is lightweight. Can fold it down and put in trunk easily. Would recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia S.

customer_reviews.title: Trays get very hot!
customer_reviews.text: Today I used the stroller for the first time. Everything was fine with the stroller until I was putting the baby into the stroller and the tray burnt my hand. It had been sitting out in the sun. Thank goodness my grandson did not touch the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller, car seat clicks right in.
customer_reviews.text: Car seat clicks right in, wheels turn easy, great wheel locking system (my driveway has a large incline). Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Van Loon

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It’s quick to set up and his ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It’s quick to set up and his car seat fits right into it with ease. Makes it easier for when it is just my wife with him and she wants to go to Kohl’s and spend all of our money.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Horton

customer_reviews.title: Must buy stroller
customer_reviews.text: Perfect stroller for my baby. She loves it. Everything is as expected. Still working great. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sandamai Jayewickrame

customer_reviews.title: Cheap stroller
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this stroller. Bad shade canopy and storage. Overall, felt cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Folds to small size
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller. Medium weight, but actually fits in my trunk (tiny Mazda 2). Works great with click in car seat.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: light weight, easy to carry, open/close etc, the shoulder pads are flimsy, the baby took them out within few minutes of using it for the first time and they disappeared!!
customer_reviews.author: BAA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and lightweight. We have the Graco Fast Action Jogging Click connect set (which I love) and I needed a stroller that would be light and easy to take on the plane. This stroller is perfect for that! Car seat clicks right into this stroller. Love the extra padding on the shoulder straps. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: Turns on a dime. Love the tray to put small bites in for the ride. The only downside is the shade cover doesn't extend very far. Otherwise a great buy, well built and folds to fit in my Prius.
customer_reviews.author: K. Butterton

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller but it is making noise after i rolling ...
customer_reviews.text: Good stroller but it is making noise after i rolling it on the sand. This locking belt have four piece and you need to lock it with patience. i sticked it with glue but it is tough. The front open close cup holder is very weak, Overall it is a good stroller inspite of the drawbacks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble only wheels, break and cups holder, easy to fold my daughter 3 yrs loved it comfy to sleep. Wheels is strong on snow and but its big a little bit in storage. also the belt couldn't fit my daughter, too short.
customer_reviews.author: layla al-ramadan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. Gave 4 stars because I wish it had larger under storage compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia F.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely nice stroller! I really enjoy the way it rolls ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely nice stroller! I really enjoy the way it rolls and turns. The cup holders for adult and child are a plus. My order arrived as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Bumgarner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I loveddddd it!!! It it is very light and easy to fold, i expected something cheaper but it’s amazing, and i have a big baby and the seat os perfect for him!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Santos Benavides

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stroller! This is my second one, I bought a new one because of personal reasons. It only took me like 10 minutes to put together, it's lightweight, and works with my infant car seat.
customer_reviews.author: T.M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stroller! Got a great price for it, my daughter did not want to get out of the stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its really just okay
customer_reviews.text: After using this stroller for a few weeks I am somewhat disappointed in it. The sun shade is pointless really, it doesn't cover baby enough. The stroller is also very easily tipped backwards...it so light the front will tip if you put your bag in the basket. There is certainly no hanging a diaper bag on the handle. I agree it is very lightweight and I love that I can fold and unfold it with one hand. I would return if I felt like going thru all the hassle. If you need a light stroller for light use, this could work.
customer_reviews.author: mandalc

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is perhaps not sturdy enough for daily use
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is perhaps not sturdy enough for daily use, but as a grandma, it's just perfect for my occasional needs. It is very lightweight and easy to open and fold up, and has good storage underneath. I would highly recommend this stroller for moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Jo Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, it’s lightweight, super easy to assemble and hasn’t given me any issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Skills

customer_reviews.title: overall it is a great and handy stroller
customer_reviews.text: I wish the sun shade cover would cover more area, overall it is a great and handy stroller. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen M

customer_reviews.title: I really like this stroller the only thing I wish it would ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stroller the only thing I wish it would have is an adjustable handle since I'm very short. My previous stroller had this and it was so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Overall great stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight, compact stroller with multiple cup holders and one smaller storage compartment at the top with bigger storage underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive looking. A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Great quality, not cheap looking! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: A. Mears

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stroller collapses easily and it is really light but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Car seat clicks on
customer_reviews.text: Very good and durable I love that the car seat clicks in and when my son outgrows his car seat I can use this stroller even longer
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Craven

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect size stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size stroller. Not too small and not too big and bulky. Very easy to assemble and fold
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have had this one in the beginning. We had a three-wheel stroller and I hated it. So difficult to maneuver and heavy! This is a breeze and so much easier. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very bad stroller...not able to fold
customer_reviews.text: The stroller got suddenly stuck n I am not able to fold it only after 4month...right now it is only a junk piece in my house...totally waste of money
customer_reviews.author: debalina

customer_reviews.title: Nice one for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a weightless and super easy to open and close. I have a different brand car seat which does not fix in the stroller that is the only concern. When it comes to stroller it is perfect buy for the price and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Suvi

customer_reviews.title: Folding lock jammed
customer_reviews.text: This product got jammed with folding lock. We have to return on the same day of it's assembly
customer_reviews.author: Adithya bhat

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Took 15 minutes. I and my daughter assembled it. No tools required.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money, comfortable, easily foldable and had for all the required features
customer_reviews.author: Santosh

customer_reviews.title: this is perfect for every occasion
customer_reviews.text: this is perfect for every occasion, folds easy, lots of storage, smooth wheels. what mire can i say perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Very easy assembly takes about 5 minutes to just put the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy assembly takes about 5 minutes to just put the wheels on. Easy one foot brake system and car seat just clicks right in for the infant car seat. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon

customer_reviews.title: It's okay product. But after 3 months of using ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay product. But after 3 months of using it, not regularly though, its wheel started making cranky noise as if it needed some kind of oiling. Else I do not have any major complaint with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ameya Purohit

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my newborn
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my newborn,Car seat fits easily. Easy to fold up and throw into the trunk of the car for our destination.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my son. It’s lightweight, easy to assemble and not to bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Santino

customer_reviews.title: True to description
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturers description of this stroller is accurate. Easy to put together, easy to use, and it’s lightweight. It works great with or without the use of an infant carrier.

customer_reviews.title: The best stroller
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best stroller I’ve bought so far! It’s so easy to fold and so light.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. It's lightweight and durable. Easy to fold
customer_reviews.author: shelly luminais

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it; so convenient with our snug fit infant seat 🙂

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable while walking since you don't get enough leg space
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed but stick in bottom of backside is risky. Not comfortable while walking since you don't get enough leg space. Risky because kids may fall down because of that.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Perfect with car seat and very easy to fold and unfold.

customer_reviews.text: We love this stroller as it is light and compact and very easy to fold and unfold. Exactly what we needed!

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can assemble it so easy I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stroller does not sit upright which is a drawback as our granddaughter likes to sit straight up.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It did meet my expectations my wife and i loved it :)

customer_reviews.text: We been using this product for 6 months not and it is good solid product.

customer_reviews.title: Great Economical Choice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. It is lighter in weight; very easy to fold up and to pop back up. I use it a lot and it is holding up well. I would have given it a 5 star if the handle and/or seat would reverse so that I could view my grandchild. I also wish the shade were a bit longer as the sun still hits him quit a bit. Otherwise, it is a great and economical choice!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Messick

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love! This is my second one. My first one broke after using for almost a year, but was my fault for tipping it over. It still works, but I just can't get it to fold up.

customer_reviews.title: Nice. But my concern is that the straps would ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice. But my concern is that the straps would have been a bit lengthy. My daughter is tall baby and find it difficult in fitting her

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to open and close. Has everything I need. Easy to maneuver

product_meta.title: Graco Verb Click Connect Stroller, Chili Red
product_meta.description:
The Graco Verb Click Connect Stroller gives you a stylish and smooth ride for your child. It features Click Connect technology to accept all top-rated SnugRide Click Connect infant car seats with a secure, one-second attachment and an audible click for peace of mind. The lightweight stroller has suspension and a locking front-swivel wheel for an always-smooth ride and a multi-position reclining seat. There are plenty of convenience features to keep you and baby happy, including parent's and child's tray with cup holders and a large storage basket. You'll appreciate the one-hand, self-standing fold and the included carry strap. Care and Maintenance - To clean stroller frame and seat pad, spot clean using mild soap and warm water, Never use bleach, Use light oil if wheels squeak.

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: This Graco stroller accepts all Graco Click Connect infant car seats with a secure, one-step attachment to create your own custom travel system

Suspension gives your child a smoother, more enjoyable ride on different terrains. Accepts all Graco Click Connect infant car seats with a secure, one-step attachment to create your own custom travel system
Locking front-swivel wheels provide easier maneuverability and more control when you're out and about with baby
One-hand, self-standing fold closes easily and the carry strap makes it convenient for moms on-the-go
Stroller weighs less than 20 Pound, for maximum portability.Stroller holds baby up to 50 Pounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars185 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
